Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at Archer/40th
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Pershing, Kedzie and resume normal route on Archer near Archer/40th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Archer, Pershing, Kedzie and resume normal route on Archer due to fire department activity near  Archer/40th.

Allow extra travel time.
